titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 476) to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit taking minors across State lines in circumvention of laws requiring the involvement of parents in abortion decisions.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-411, by Mrs. Myrick.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 142.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 388.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/16/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 388 (prohibition on taking minors across State lines in circumvention of laws requiring the involvement of parents in abortion decisions).
